source.sqlReaderQuery: select TableName,WatermarkValue as oldwatermarkvalue from dbo.watermarktable where [TableName] = 'orders'
select max(InsertDateTime) as newwatermarkvalue from orders

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from orders where InsertDateTime >'@{activity('lkp_oldwatermarkvalue').output.FirstRow.oldwatermarkvalue}' and InsertDateTime <= '@{activity('lkp_newwatermarkvalue').output.FirstRow.newwatermarkvalue}'
SELECT TableName,WatermarkValue as oldwatermarkvalue from dbo.watermarktable where [TableName] = '@{pipeline().parameters.TableName}'

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PurchaseOrderID as string,
		{ CustomerCode} as integer,
		ProductCode as string,
		EmployeeCode as string,
		{ PuchaseOrderDate} as string,
		{ Quantity} as integer,
		{ UnitPrice} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> PurchaseOrder
source(output(
		CustomerCode as short,
		{ CustomerName} as string,
		{ Address} as string,
		{ PhoneNumber} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Customer
PurchaseOrder select(mapColumn(
		{ CustomerCode},
		ProductCode,
		{ Quantity}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PurchaseOrderProjection
Customer select(mapColumn(
		CustomerCode,
		{ CustomerName}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomerProjection
PurchaseOrderProjection, CustomerProjection join({ CustomerCode} == CustomerCode,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinedStream
JoinedStream aggregate(groupBy({ CustomerCode},
		ProductCode),
	{ Quantity} = sum({ Quantity})) ~> Metrics
Metrics sink(input(
		CustomerCode as integer,
		ProductCode as integer,
		Quantity as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerCode = { CustomerCode},
		ProductCode = { Quantity}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Output
